METHOD_DESC_1: Set a song limit per user for non DJs.
METHOD_DESC_2: Set a time limit per song for non DJs.
METHOD_DESC_3: Reset the song limit per user for non DJs.
METHOD_DESC_4: Reset the time limit per song for non DJs.
EMBED_LIMIT_SUMMARY:
Time limit per song: {{timeLimit}}
Song limit per user: {{songLimit}}
EMBED_MINIMUM_SONGS: Minimum song limit per user is `1`.
EMBED_MAXIMUMG_SONGS: Maximum songs per user in queue set to: {{songamount}}
EMBED_MINIMUM_TIME: Minimum time limit per song is `00:01:00`.
EMBED_MAXIMUM_TIME: Maximum time limit per song is set to: {{TIME}}
EMBED_NO_SONG_LIMIT: There is no song limit for non DJs.
EMBED_REMOVED_SONG_LIMIT: There is no song limit per user anymore.
EMBED_NO_TIME_LIMIT: There is no time limit for non DJs.
EMBED_REMOVED_TIME_LIMIT: There is no time limit on songs anymore.
